item.title: Ablockchain Atomic Swap
item.description: https://en.bitcoin.it/wiki/Atomic_swap Algorithm 2 pay txs and 2 claim tx claim txs are singed at first, locked with time 2 pay txs are encrypted by x, affects only when x is reveal on the network Initialization A: random number x tx1: A pay B A Pay BTC to B’s public key if x known & singed by B or Signed by A & B tx2: A claim tx1 pay BTC to A’s public key locked 48 hours signed by A
